markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unseat](/Feats.aspx?ID=6295) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 193 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=244)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6286)

**Requirements**
You are riding your mount and wielding a [Jousting](/Traits.aspx?ID=638) weapon.

</column>

---

With a mighty blow from atop your companion, you attempt to knock an opponent off their mount. Make a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) against a mounted creature. If your attack hits, attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check against the target’s Fortitude DC. If you succeed, the target is knocked off its mount into a space of its choice adjacent to its mount. If you critically succeed, the target also lands prone.
name: Unseat
requirement: You are riding your mount and wielding a  Jousting  weapon.
requirement_markdown: You are riding your mount and wielding a [Jousting](/Traits.aspx?ID=638) weapon.

If you succeed, the target is knocked off its mount into a space of its choice adjacent to its mount. If you critically succeed, the target also lands prone.
